name: ghost town birthdays
description:
It's your ghost friend's birthday and it's your job to distract them while the rest of your ghost friends get their surprise party ready! Explore town, grab some ice cream, and shop around. And when the time's right, go back home and let the celebration commence :D

Pretty happy with this fun little time. Missing my friends and have been listening to podcasts, so some of that leaked into this game.  Chill out and enjoy these tiny ghosts stuck in your screen :) Also, the cats are immortal, well-fed, and get many pets!  Don't stress! 

There's some music so feel free to turn on your volume.  Also, move with your arrow keys :)
